thread.title: Unchained melody: Imtiaz Ali, AR Rahman and Irshad Kamil relive sounds of ‘Tamasha’
thread.title_full: Unchained melody: Imtiaz Ali, AR Rahman and Irshad Kamil relive sounds of ‘Tamasha’ - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Unchained melody: Imtiaz Ali, AR Rahman and Irshad Kamil relive sounds of ‘Tamasha’
text:
Successful trio of music composer A R Rahman, lyricist Irshad Kamil and director Imtiaz Ali come together to discuss their musical journey of Tamasha .
Makers of the Ranbir-Deepika- starrer recently released their first song from the album, 'Matargashti' , which was received very well by the audiences.
READ: Deepika Padukone and Ranbir Kapoor's 'Matargashti'
The musical trio has worked together on successful music of films like Highway and Rockstar and their fans have been eagerly waiting for the release of their next work, Tamasha .
The makers held a session wherein each song from the film was played and they discussed the process of creating the song.
It was very interesting to understand the process of creating each track right from the thought behind it, the music, lyrics to the final singing.
Presented by UTV Motion Pictures & Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment, Produced by Sajid Nadiadwala, Tamasha is slated to release on November 27, 2015 and the music will be out on October 16, 2015.
